00055 // The triggers in this constraint are set up as follows:
00056 // If the length of the vector is L.
00057 
00058 // The first 2 * Dom(Result) literals are, for some j
00059 //   literal 2 * i : attached to assignment i to V[j]
00060 //   literal 2 * i + 1 : attached to the assignment j in IndexVar 
00061 
00062 // After this there are 2 * Dom(Index) literals are, for some j
00063 // literal 2 * i : attached to j in V[i]
00064 // literal 2 * i + 1 : attached to j in Result
00065 
00066 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_ELEMENT_H
00067 #define CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_ELEMENT_H
00068 
00069 // for the reverse constraint.
00070 #include "../constraints/constraint_equal.h"
00071 #include "dynamic_new_or.h"
00072 #include "dynamic_new_and.h"
00073 #include "unary/dynamic_literal.h"
00074 #include "unary/dynamic_notinrange.h"
00075 
00076 
00077 template<typename VarArray, typename Index, typename Result>
00078 struct ElementConstraintDynamic : public AbstractConstraint
00079 {
00080   virtual string constraint_name()
00081   { return "ElementDynamic"; }
00082   
00083   //  typedef BoolLessSumConstraintDynamic<VarArray, VarSum,1-VarToCount> NegConstraintType;
00084   typedef typename VarArray::value_type VarRef;
00085   
00086   // ReversibleInt count;
00087   VarArray var_array;
00088   Index indexvar;
00089   Result resultvar;
00090   
00091   DomainInt initial_result_dom_min;
00092   DomainInt initial_result_dom_max;
00093   
00094   vector<DomainInt> current_support;
00095   
00096   ElementConstraintDynamic(StateObj* _stateObj, const VarArray& _var_array, const Index& _index, const Result& _result) :
00097     AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), var_array(_var_array), indexvar(_index), resultvar(_result)
00098   { 
00099       initial_result_dom_min = resultvar.getInitialMin();
00100       initial_result_dom_max = resultvar.getInitialMax();
00101   }
00102   
00103   int dynamic_trigger_count()
00104   {
00105     int count = var_array.size() * 2 + 
00106     checked_cast<int>(initial_result_dom_max - initial_result_dom_min + 1) * 2 
00107     + 1 
00108     + 1; 
00109     current_support.resize(count / 2);           // is int the right type?
00110     return count;
00111   }
00112   
00113   void find_new_support_for_result(int j)
00114   {
00115     DomainInt realj = j + initial_result_dom_min;
00116     
00117     if(!resultvar.inDomain(realj))
00118       return;
00119     
00120     int array_size = var_array.size();
00121     
00122     // support is value of index
00123     DomainInt oldsupport = max(current_support[j + array_size], indexvar.getMin());  // old support probably just removed
00124     DomainInt maxsupport = indexvar.getMax();
00125     
00126     DomainInt support = oldsupport;
00127     
00128     DynamicTrigger* dt = dynamic_trigger_start();
00129     while(support <= maxsupport && 
00130           !(indexvar.inDomain_noBoundCheck(support) && 
00131             var_array[checked_cast<int>(support)].inDomain(realj)))
00132       ++support;
00133     if(support > maxsupport)
00134     { 
00135       support = indexvar.getMin();
00136       DomainInt max_check = min(oldsupport, maxsupport + 1);
00137       while(support < max_check && 
00138             !(indexvar.inDomain_noBoundCheck(support) &&
00139               var_array[checked_cast<int>(support)].inDomain(realj)))
00140         ++support;
00141       if (support == max_check) 
00142       {
00143         resultvar.removeFromDomain(realj); 
00144         return;
00145       }
00146     }
00147     var_array[checked_cast<int>(support)].addDynamicTrigger(dt + 2*j, DomainRemoval, realj);
00148     indexvar.addDynamicTrigger(dt + 2*j + 1, DomainRemoval, support);
00149     current_support[j + array_size] = support;
00150   }
00151   
00152   void find_new_support_for_index(int i)
00153   {
00154     if(!indexvar.inDomain(i))
00155       return;
00156     
00157     DomainInt resultvarmin = resultvar.getMin();
00158     DomainInt resultvarmax = resultvar.getMax();
00159     DynamicTrigger* dt = dynamic_trigger_start() + 
00160                          checked_cast<int>((initial_result_dom_max - initial_result_dom_min + 1) * 2);
00161                          
00162     if(resultvarmin == resultvarmax)
00163     {
00164       if(!var_array[i].inDomain(resultvarmin))
00165         indexvar.removeFromDomain(i);
00166       else
00167       {
00168         var_array[i].addDynamicTrigger(dt + 2*i, DomainRemoval, resultvarmin);
00169         resultvar.addDynamicTrigger(dt + 2*i + 1, DomainRemoval, resultvarmin);
00170         current_support[i] = resultvarmin;
00171       }
00172       return;
00173     }
00174     
00175 
00176     // support is value of result
00177     DomainInt oldsupport = max(current_support[i], resultvarmin); // old support probably just removed
00178     DomainInt maxsupport = resultvarmax;
00179     DomainInt support = oldsupport;
00180     
00181     //int support = initial_result_dom_min;
00182     while(support <= maxsupport &&
00183           !(resultvar.inDomain_noBoundCheck(support) && var_array[i].inDomain(support)))
00184       ++support;
00185       
00186     if(support > maxsupport)
00187     { 
00188       support = resultvarmin;
00189       DomainInt max_check = min(oldsupport, maxsupport + 1);
00190       while(support < max_check &&     
00191             !(resultvar.inDomain_noBoundCheck(support) && var_array[i].inDomain(support)))
00192         ++support;
00193       if( support >= max_check )      
00194       {
00195         indexvar.removeFromDomain(i); 
00196         return;
00197       }
00198     }
00199     
00200     var_array[i].addDynamicTrigger(dt + 2*i, DomainRemoval, support);
00201     resultvar.addDynamicTrigger(dt + 2*i + 1, DomainRemoval, support);
00202     current_support[i] = support;
00203   }
00204   
00205   void deal_with_assigned_index()
00206   {
00207     D_ASSERT(indexvar.isAssigned());
00208     int indexval = checked_cast<int>(indexvar.getAssignedValue());
00209     VarRef& var = var_array[indexval];
00210     
00211     DomainInt lower = resultvar.getMin(); 
00212     if( lower > var.getMin() ) 
00213     {
00214       var.setMin(lower);
00215       ++lower;                      // do not need to check lower bound, we know it's in resultvar
00216     }
00217     
00218     DomainInt upper = resultvar.getMax(); 
00219     if( upper < var.getMax() ) 
00220     {
00221       var.setMax(upper);
00222       --upper;                      // do not need to check upper bound, we know it's in resultvar
00223     }
00224     
00225     for(DomainInt i = lower; i <= upper; ++i)
00226     {
00227       if(!(resultvar.inDomain(i)))
00228         var.removeFromDomain(i); 
00229     }
00230   }
00231   
00232   virtual void full_propagate()
00233   {
00234     for(int i=0; i<var_array.size(); i++) {
00235         if(var_array[i].isBound() && !var_array[i].isAssigned()) { // isassigned excludes constants.
00236             cerr << "Warning: watchelement is not designed to be used on bound variables and may cause crashes." << endl;
00237         }
00238     }
00239     if((indexvar.isBound() && !indexvar.isAssigned())
00240         || (resultvar.isBound() && !resultvar.isAssigned())) {
00241         cerr << "Warning: watchelement is not designed to be used on bound variables and may cause crashes." << endl;
00242     }
00243     
00244     int array_size = var_array.size(); 
00245     DomainInt result_dom_size = initial_result_dom_max - initial_result_dom_min + 1;
00246     
00247     // Setup SupportLostForIndexValue(i,j)
00248     // Here we are supporting values in the index variable
00249     // So for each variable in the index variable, we want to ensure
00250     
00251     // Couple of quick sanity-propagations.
00252     // We define UNDEF = false ;)
00253     indexvar.setMin(0);
00254     indexvar.setMax(array_size - 1);
00255     
00256     if(getState(stateObj).isFailed()) return;
00257     
00258     for(int i = 0; i < array_size; ++i)
00259     {
00260       current_support[i] = initial_result_dom_min-1;        // will be incremented if support sought
00261       if(indexvar.inDomain(i))
00262         find_new_support_for_index(i);
00263     }
00264     
00265     for(int i = 0; i < result_dom_size; ++i)
00266     {
00267       current_support[i+array_size] = -1;   // will be incremented if support sought
00268       if(resultvar.inDomain(i + initial_result_dom_min))
00269         find_new_support_for_result(i);
00270     }
00271     
00272     if(indexvar.isAssigned())
00273       deal_with_assigned_index();
00274     
00275     DynamicTrigger* dt = dynamic_trigger_start();
00276     
00277     dt += var_array.size() * 2 +
00278       checked_cast<int>((initial_result_dom_max - initial_result_dom_min + 1) * 2);
00279     
00280     // for(int i = initial_result_dom_min; i <= initial_result_dom_max; ++i)
00281     // {
00282     // resultvar.addDynamicTrigger(dt, DomainRemoval, i);
00283     // ++dt;
00284     // }
00285     resultvar.addDynamicTrigger(dt, DomainChanged);
00286     ++dt;
00287     
00288     indexvar.addDynamicTrigger(dt, Assigned);
00289     
00290   }
00291   
00292   
00293   virtual void propagate(DynamicTrigger* trig)
00294   {
00295     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(DynElement);
00296     DynamicTrigger* dt = dynamic_trigger_start();
00297     unsigned pos = trig - dt;
00298     unsigned array_size = var_array.size();
00299     unsigned result_support_triggers = 
00300       checked_cast<unsigned int>((initial_result_dom_max - initial_result_dom_min + 1) * 2);
00301     unsigned index_support_triggers =  array_size * 2;
00302     // int when_index_assigned_triggers = (initial_result_dom_max - initial_result_dom_min + 1);
00303     if(pos < result_support_triggers)
00304     {// It was a value in the result var which lost support
00305       find_new_support_for_result(pos / 2);
00306       return;
00307     }
00308     pos -= result_support_triggers;
00309     
00310     if(pos < index_support_triggers)
00311     {// A value in the index var lost support
00312       find_new_support_for_index( pos / 2 );
00313       return;
00314     }
00315     pos -= index_support_triggers;
00316     
00317     // if(pos < when_index_assigned_triggers)
00318     if (pos == 0)
00319     { // A value was removed from result var
00320       if(indexvar.isAssigned())
00321       {
00322         deal_with_assigned_index();
00323       }
00324       return;
00325     }
00326     
00327     D_ASSERT(pos == 1);
00328     // index has become assigned.
00329     deal_with_assigned_index();
00330   }
00331   
00332     virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00333     {
00334       D_ASSERT(v_size == var_array.size() + 2);
00335       DomainInt resultvariable = v[v_size - 1];
00336       DomainInt indexvariable = v[v_size - 2];
00337       if(indexvariable < 0 || indexvariable >= (int)v_size - 2)
00338         return false;
00339       return v[checked_cast<int>(indexvariable)] == resultvariable;
00340     }
00341     
00342     virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00343   { 
00344     vector<AnyVarRef> vars;
00345     vars.reserve(var_array.size() + 2);
00346     for(unsigned i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00347       vars.push_back(var_array[i]);
00348     vars.push_back(indexvar);
00349     vars.push_back(resultvar);
00350     return vars;
00351   }
00352   
00353   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00354   {  
00355     DomainInt array_start = max(DomainInt(0), indexvar.getMin());
00356     DomainInt array_end   = min(DomainInt(var_array.size()) - 1, indexvar.getMax());
00357 
00358     for(int i = array_start; i <= array_end; ++i)
00359     {
00360       if(indexvar.inDomain(i))
00361       {
00362         DomainInt dom_start = max(resultvar.getMin(), var_array[i].getMin());
00363         DomainInt dom_end   = min(resultvar.getMax(), var_array[i].getMax());
00364         for(DomainInt domval = dom_start; domval <= dom_end; ++domval)
00365         {
00366           if(var_array[i].inDomain(domval) && resultvar.inDomain(domval))
00367           {
00368             // indexvar = i
00369             assignment.push_back(make_pair(var_array.size(), i));
00370             // resultvar = domval
00371             assignment.push_back(make_pair(var_array.size() + 1, domval));
00372             // vararray[i] = domval
00373             assignment.push_back(make_pair(i, domval));
00374             return true;
00375           }
00376         }
00377       }
00378     }
00379     return false;
00380   }
00381   
00382   virtual AbstractConstraint* reverse_constraint()
00383   {
00384       // This is a slow-ish temporary solution.
00385       // (i=1 and X[1]!=r) or (i=2 ...
00386       vector<AbstractConstraint*> con;
00387       // or the index is out of range:
00388       vector<int> r; r.push_back(0); r.push_back(var_array.size()-1);
00389       AbstractConstraint* t4=(AbstractConstraint*) new WatchNotInRangeConstraint<Index>(stateObj, indexvar, r);
00390       con.push_back(t4);
00391       
00392       for(int i=0; i<var_array.size(); i++)
00393       {
00394           vector<AbstractConstraint*> con2;
00395           WatchLiteralConstraint<Index>* t=new WatchLiteralConstraint<Index>(stateObj, indexvar, i);
00396           con2.push_back((AbstractConstraint*) t);
00397           NeqConstraintBinary<AnyVarRef, Result>* t2=new NeqConstraintBinary<AnyVarRef, Result>(stateObj, var_array[i], resultvar);
00398           con2.push_back((AbstractConstraint*) t2);
00399           
00400           Dynamic_AND* t3= new Dynamic_AND(stateObj, con2);
00401           con.push_back((AbstractConstraint*) t3);
00402       }
00403       
00404       return new Dynamic_OR(stateObj, con);
00405   }
00406 };
00407 
00408 
00409 template<typename Var1, typename Var2>
00410 AbstractConstraint*
00411 BuildCT_WATCHED_ELEMENT(StateObj* stateObj, const Var1& vararray, const Var2& v1, const Var1& v2, ConstraintBlob&)
00412 { 
00413   return new ElementConstraintDynamic<Var1, typename Var2::value_type, typename Var1::value_type>
00414               (stateObj, vararray, v1[0], v2[0]);  
00415 }
00416 
00417 template<typename Var1, typename Var2, typename Var3>
00418 AbstractConstraint*
00419 BuildCT_WATCHED_ELEMENT(StateObj* stateObj, Var1 vararray, const Var2& v1, const Var3& v2, ConstraintBlob&)
00420 { 
00421   return new ElementConstraintDynamic<Var1, typename Var2::value_type, AnyVarRef>
00422               (stateObj, vararray, v1[0], AnyVarRef(v2[0]));  
00423 }
00424 
00425 template<typename Var1, typename Var2, typename Var3>
00426 AbstractConstraint*
00427 BuildCT_WATCHED_ELEMENT_ONE(StateObj* stateObj, const Var1& vararray, const Var2& v1, const Var3& v2, ConstraintBlob& b)
00428 { 
00429   typedef typename ShiftType<typename Var2::value_type, compiletime_val<-1> >::type ShiftVal;
00430   vector<ShiftVal> replace_v1;
00431   replace_v1.push_back(ShiftVarRef(v1[0], compiletime_val<-1>()));
00432   return BuildCT_WATCHED_ELEMENT(stateObj, vararray, replace_v1, v2, b);
00433 }
